Texto: 
right sided sensi-neural hearing loss.
surgical excision
mri 
 -isointense to slightly hypointense on t1wi relative to brain
 -hyperintense on t2wi 
 -intensely enhancing homogeneous mass
vestibular ('acoustic') schwannoma
acustic neuroma
meningoioma
aneurysm
history of right sided hearing loss. denies other symptoms.
